#summary Contains global settings used within the API.  These settings range from API keys to oAuth tokens(once set). The Settings Object contains both Get and SET methods.


= {{{Settings(api, key, value) }}} =
Extends Social
Contains global settings used within the API. Contains both Get and SET methods.
<wiki:toc />
== Details ==
*Defined in:* clientapi\newDoc.js





=== Parameters ===
|| *Type* || *Name* || *Additional Info* || *Description* ||
|| string || api ||  || The name of the API / top-level object of data you wish to access. (ie. "Facebook") ||
|| string || key ||  || The Name/Path to the key that you wish to retrieve or set the value of. ||
|| string || value || Optional || The value you wish the set the Key as. ||


=== Returns ===
|| *Type* || *Name* || *Description* ||
|| string / boolean ||  || Returns either the value requested or true if the value has been set. ||


== Fields ==

=== {{{Settings.Data <static> }}} ===
Simple Object that contains all the Settings data used throughout the Framework





==== Examples ====
{{{
Settings.Data = {	Default : {		AjaxPath:"http://resources.jacquespagels.com/SocialMedia/api.php?url="	},	Facebook : {		AppKey : "270268832987702", 		Url : {       	API:"http://connect.facebook.net/en_US/all.js",	        Harverst:null		},    	Loaded:false,  	oAuth:null,   	HarvestFields : "first_name, middle_name, last_name"	},	Twitter : {		Url : {			Timeline: "https://twitter.com/statuses/user_timeline/"		},		TweetSettings:{			text : "This is a test",			url : "",			via:"magicTown",			hashTags:""		},		TimelineCount:"3",		AccountName : "magictown"	}};
}}}


----

== Methods ==

=== {{{Settings.Get <private> <static>  -> string }}} ===
Retrieves a Setting that has been stored in the Settings.Data object





==== Examples ====
{{{
Social.Settings("Facebook", "AppKey"); // Returns the AppKey for Facebook that has been stored.
}}}


==== Parameters ====
|| *Type* || *Name* || *Additional Info* || *Description* ||
|| string || api ||  || The name of the API / top-level object of data you wish to access. (ie. "Facebook") ||
|| string || key ||  || The Name/Path to the key that you wish to retrieve the value of. ||


==== Returns ====
|| *Type* || *Name* || *Description* ||
|| string ||  || Returns the value requested ||

----
=== {{{Settings.Set <private> <static>  -> boolean }}} ===
SETS a value in the Settings.Data object





==== Examples ====
{{{
Social.Settings("Facebook", "AppKey", "1234567890"); // Returns true if the AppKey for Facebook has been stored.
}}}


==== Parameters ====
|| *Type* || *Name* || *Additional Info* || *Description* ||
|| string || api ||  || The name of the API / top-level object of data you wish to access. (ie. "Facebook") ||
|| string || key ||  || The Name/Path to the key that you wish to set the value of. ||
|| string || value || Optional || The value you wish the set the Key as. ||


==== Returns ====
|| *Type* || *Name* || *Description* ||
|| boolean ||  || Returns true if the value has been set. ||
